objects.text:
• 3-in-1 Filter Cleaner for Better Sleep
• Removes Pollutants & Neutralizes Odors
• Portable & Quiet (25-44dB)

product_details.description: Note: The adapter is stored inside the air purifier; Power Adapter(Input): 100-240V 50/60 H Rated Power: 7W Noise Level: 25-44dB Dimension: 6.5 × 6.5 × 10.4 inch. 𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗢𝗩𝗘 𝗣𝗢𝗟𝗟𝗨𝗧𝗔𝗡𝗧𝗦 𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: Our Pre-Filter and Main Filter capture lint, hair, pet dander, fine airborne pollutants, and smoke particles, helping achieve a cleaner environment for you 𝗛𝗘𝗟𝗣 𝗠𝗔𝗞𝗘 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗦 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗟𝗘𝗦𝗦: The Activated Carbon Filter helps neutralize smoke, odors, and fumes. You’ll love the feeling of breathing deeply at home 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗜𝗧 𝗔𝗡𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: With the Levoit Core Mini-P air purifiers for home, focus on your activities in the bedroom, kitchen, or office. It offers an auto-off display for uninterrupted sleep and calming aromatherapy #𝟭 𝗔𝗜𝗥 𝗣𝗨𝗥𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗥 𝗕𝗥𝗔𝗡𝗗: Levoit has sold over 6.5 million products worldwide, is available in 35 countries and regions, and has been a pioneer in air purification technology for 6 years 𝗚𝗘𝗡𝗨𝗜𝗡𝗘 𝗟𝗘𝗩𝗢𝗜𝗧 𝗙𝗜𝗟𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗦: Only use genuine Levoit replacement parts to maintain the best performance (Search for Core Mini-RF). Off-brand filters are inconsistent, unreliable, and may damage the air purifier 𝗡𝗢𝗧𝗘: Our products are manufactured in both Vietnam and China, so you may receive a machine made in either Vietnam or China Color - White ** Brand - LEVOIT ** Product Dimensions - 6.5"D x 6.5"W x 10.4"H ** Floor Area - 337 Square Feet ** Specification Met - ETL Certified **

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek and modern promotional layout for a product, integrating clean geometric text and a vibrant product image. The layout is balanced with the product image ("product_image") on the right and marketing content on the left. It uses a soft two-tone background ("background") with gradient and abstract wave-like accents that add airflow visual motifs, suggesting freshness.

The headline ("heading") uses a bold, futuristic font in dark cyan, followed by a lighter subheadline ("subheading") just beneath. A feature list ("description") in fine grey text provides product benefits. Pricing ("price") is prominently set in a matching cyan tone. A solid cyan rectangle ("cta_background") frames a white "SHOP NOW" call-to-action text ("cta") in uppercase, inviting engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Sky Blue (#F0F8FF)
- Pale Azure (#E6F2FF)
- Soft Wave Blue (#E1F5FE)
- Deep Cyan-Blue (#2B7A9B)
- Sky Blue Accent (#4FC3F7)
- Medium Cyan (#4BA3C3)
- Charcoal Gray (#333333)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a sleek, minimalistic air purifier with a clean and modern aesthetic. The primary color is a crisp white (#FFFFFF), which gives a fresh and hygienic impression. A medium to dark gray (#4A4A4A) is used for the top vent and controls, adding contrast while maintaining a neutral palette. Subtle accents in light gray (#D3D3D3) are used for the brand text and holes, blending seamlessly into the white body while adding texture. Touches of blue (#0096FF) and red (#FF3B30) on the control panel provide functionality highlights. This neutral yet polished color scheme is ideal for minimalist, future-forward ads.
